code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./QuestionSelector.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuestionSelector=_ref=>{let{testData,onQuestionsSelect}=_ref;const[selectedQuestions,setSelectedQuestions]=useState([]);const handleQuestionToggle=questionIndex=>{const updatedQuestions=[...selectedQuestions];updatedQuestions[questionIndex]=!updatedQuestions[questionIndex];setSelectedQuestions(updatedQuestions);};const handleStartTest=()=>{const questionsToSend=testData.questions.filter((question,index)=>selectedQuestions[index]);onQuestionsSelect(questionsToSend);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-selector-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"question-selector-header",children:"Choose question:"}),testData.questions.map((question,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:selectedQuestions[index]||false,onChange:()=>handleQuestionToggle(index),className:"question-checkbox"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:question.question})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStartTest,className:"start-test-button",children:"Start Quiz"})]});};export default QuestionSelector;
